Posts.Content: Jun 20, 2012 05:54PM - edited Jun 20, 2012 05:55PM by mamaoftwins Thank you Debbie!  My doctors told me that if they remove more tissue, my breast could die. They also aren't quite sure of the exact location of my unclear margins so doing surgery is kinda risky.  I would hate to go through another surgery where they can't get it all (again) Thank you for your kindness! Melissa
Posts.Title: Unclear margins after mastectomy mamaoftwins christina0001

Posts.Content: mamaoftwins wrote: I'm looking for support from others that have had a mastectomy and ended up with unclear margins. I opted for a mastectomy instead of a lumpectomy because of the fear of radiation and unclear margins.   Now it appears that I'll have to do the radiation anyways.  Melissa (Mama of Twins) Dx 4/23/2012, IDC, <1cm, Stage I, Grade 1, 0/2 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Unclear margins after mastectomy mamaoftwins christina0001
